Title: Object: Virgin and Child
Description: The Rest on the Flight to Egypt; the Virgin seated with the Christ Child on her lap at left, sleeping with His head against her shoulder while she looks down to right, St Joseph standing beyond at right. Hand-coloured mezzotint with some etching
Curator's comments: Based on the larger composition, which includes St Joseph, now in the Alte Pinakothek, Munich (inv. no. 555).
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (542) (Van Dyck; undescribed copy)
Chaloner Smith 1883 / British Mezzotinto portraits from the introduction of the art to the early part of the present century (undescribed)
Russell 1926 / English Mezzotint Portraits and their states: Catalogue of Corrections of and Additions to Chaloner Smith's "British Mezzotinto Portraits" (undescribed)
